pr_title: Cleanup: Correct annotation array initializer indents from checkstyle #8083

timeline.bodyText:
https://github.com/pmd/build-tools/blob/a847dc52ccdaafff9b8324da4390bc2043f6e926/src/main/resources/net/sourceforge/pmd/pmd-checkstyle-config.xml#L230-L233
In your pmd config the arrayInitIndent, basicOffset, lineWrapping is 4 and thus these lines should be indented at level 4.
See checkstyle/checkstyle#8083 (comment) for more info.
timeline.author: Abhishek-kumar09
